keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: Marinated battered pork pieces deep friwend and served in a mildly sharp and refreshingly sweet syrupy sauce, best served with steamed rice.

method.text: Put the pork in a bowl. Stir in the sherry, soy sauce and salt. Leave to marinate for 20 min.
Mix together the egg and cornflour to form a smooth batter. Drain the marinated pork. Add to the batter. Gently stir to coat.
Remove pork from the batter with a slotted spoon. Deep fry in batches until golden. Drain on kitchen paper.
For the sauce: Mix together the chicken stock, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar and tomato puree in a saucepan. Bring to the boil. Add the vegetables and waterchestnuts. Stir well.
Mix the cornflour with 1 teaspoon of water. Stir into the sauce. Bring back to the boil, stirring until thickened. Serve.

title: Sweet and sour pork
